channel.title: [BUG] Chilled carried over into MVP discussion time
channel.description:
#### On the last day, I was chilled by reaper. Reaper put up on trial and executed, ending the game. During the time for discussing/voting MVP, I could see chat (including dead chat) but could not talk. I could vote on MVPs. I could talk again in post-game screen.
#### I should have been able to chat with other players once reaper was executed
#### Steps to reproduce: With reaper the last scum, have reaper chill player. Then execute reaper.
#### Comments: This is clearly a top priority!!!!
